# Exercise 1

## Exercise 1.1

```{r}

loocv_tmse <- function(d){
  #' @d a data.frame returned by `model.frame()`
  #
  n <- dim(d)[1]
  p <- dim(d)[2]
  
  MSE <- rep(0,n)
  
  for(i in 1:n) {
    #
    lm_i <- lm(d[-i,],y=TRUE) # leave i out
    MSE_i <- (lm_i$y[i]-predict(lm_i,d[i,]))^2
    MSE[i] <- MSE_i
  }
  
  return(
    # 
    CV_n <- mean(MSE,na.rm = TRUE)
  )
}

```

```{r}
Wage.models <- list(

sapply(Wage.models, loocv_tmse)
```

## Exercise 1.3

```{r}

lm.ridge <- function(lambda=0) {
  if(lambda<0) {
    stop("Lambda not >= 0")
  }
  # .lm <- lm(logwage~age+education,ISLR::Wage)
  # .rss <- sum(.lm$residuals^2)
  # .penalty <- lambda*sum(.lm$coefficients^2)
  
  m <- model.frame(logwage~age+education,ISLR::Wage)
  Terms <- attr(eval.parent(m),"terms")
  Y <- model.response(m)
  X <- model.matrix(Terms,m,contrasts)
  n <- nrow(X)
  p <- ncol(X)
  
  obj.fun <- solve(t(X)%*%X+lambda*diag(p))%*%t(X)%*%Y
  X_ <- X%*%obj.fun
  resid <- Y - X_
  
  rss <- sum(resid^2)
  penalty <- lambda*sum(obj.fun^2)
  l2.norm <- sqrt(sum(obj.fun[-1]^2))
  
  return(
    list(
      # obj.fun=rss+penalty,
      log.lambda=log(lambda),
      l2.norm=l2.norm
    )
  )
}

plot(t(sapply(seq(0,1000,length.out = 100),lm.ridge,simplify = TRUE)))


```


# Exercise 2

```{r}

dgf <- function(n,p) {
  #' @n 
  #' @p
  
  # Initialise
  # 
  b <- rep(0,p)
  b_ <- rep(0,p)
  e <- rep(0.01,n)
  X <- matrix(runif(n*p),n,p)
  y <- 2*X[,1]+4*X[,2]+e
  r <- y
  
  M <- 10
  
  for(m in 1:M) {
    b <- b_
    xj <- X[,which.max(
      apply(X,2,function(X,r) cor(x=X,y=r))
      )]
    a <- e*sign(t(xj)%*%r)
    b <- cbind(b,b + a)
    b_ <- b[,m-1]
    r <- r - a*xj
  }
  
  return(b)
}
dgf(100,5)

```
